p: Nevertheless, in the group receiving conventional therapy, improvement in the QoL, NYHA function class and LVEF was also observed. As of three months after the initiation of conventional therapy, the QoL score changed from 39±8.4 to 55.3±4.45 (P=0.001); the NYHA function class reduced from 3.36±0.8 to 1.87±0.97 (P=0.001) and the LVEF increased from 24.7±8.9 to 29.3±6.8 (P=0.001).
